channel.title: The Continuum - Tropical Madman [New Album Coming]
channel.description:
Hello everyone. So from the past year I've been getting so much better at making music! I've took small lessons and listened to a few others tracks. This taught me so much i need to know. And i said to myself "I should make another album".
This new album will be called _The Continuum_. This album will contain at least 10 to 15 songs. I might add more. The genre will be mixed with different types of style. :sunglasses:
Also i'm making a YouTube channel for my SoundCloud. This will mostly be like video on how i make music and songs for both YouTube and SoundCloud.
Well now that you know everything ill be seeing you next month! Got to go make dem songs brudda.

item.title: The Continuum - Tropical Madman [New Album Coming]
item.dc:creator: Tropical_Madman
item.description:
Hello everyone. So from the past year I’ve been getting so much better at making music! I’ve took small lessons and listened to a few others tracks. This taught me so much i need to know. And i said to myself “I should make another album”.

This new album will be called The Continuum. This album will contain at least 10 to 15 songs. I might add more. The genre will be mixed with different types of style.

Also i’m making a YouTube channel for my SoundCloud. This will mostly be like video on how i make music and songs for both YouTube and SoundCloud.

Well now that you know everything ill be seeing you next month! Got to go make dem songs brudda.
